PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-02322012-03-01FIN,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActAuditor General Act
SubjectAgreements on the Reconfiguration of the Working Income Tax Benefit
PrecisOrder requesting that the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA (a) annually conduct the review referred to in the Agreements on the RECONFIGURATION OF THE WORKING INCOME TAX BENEFIT entered into between Canada and Quebec, British Columbia, Alberta and Nunavut and (b) provide a report on the results of those reviews.
AttachmentsAttachment
